title: [PS2] Tony Hawk's Proving Ground [NTSC] [USA]
description:
Sports

Tony Hawk's Proving Ground is the next edition of the popular game series dealing with riding a skateboard. Produced by studio Neversoft , the same company that created the earlier titles signed by the name of the famous skater . Like its predecessor , the game was released in versions for different hardware platforms and was released by Activison .

The creators of Tony Hawk ? 's Proving Ground to enable the players to put the greatest interference in appearance and character development , so that we have an impact not only on how it will look like our hero , what kind of clothes he wore , but also know what techniques and which will be specialized .

Surroundings, after which we will go , has been prepared with great care. The creators made Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹sure not to run it any ramps , handrails, height differences and other items on which you can perform crazy stunts skateboard . Much attention was also devoted to the characters skaters . They were created based on the technique of motion capture , making their animation is very realistic.

Compared to the previous part of improved gameplay mechanics , as well as introduced some new tricks , especially in introduced in the previous installment of the series Nail the Trick mode consisting in the performance of the evolution of the air in slow motion and a separate control over both legs .

Great emphasis was also placed on online play . The Tony? 's Hawk Proving Ground , players can seamlessly during play , like in Test Drive Unlimited, single pass mode in multiplayer mode , and together with other skaters compete in various competitions .

Play modes: single / multiplayer multiplayer : Internet Media : 1 DVD Uses : memory card 8 MB
